properties.name: properties
properties.summary: Contains key-value pairs of view properties and their values that are applied to the ListItem.
properties.description: If there are properties set in the ItemTemplate (not the children view templates), the values set in the list data item override the template's properties.

properties.name: template
properties.summary: Template ID configured with the templates property or LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_DEFAULT.
properties.description: On iOS, you can specify one of the following pre-defined templates: LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_CONTACTS, LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_SETTINGS or LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_SUBTITLE.
properties.default:
If the ListView's `defaultItemTemplate` property is not set,
then <Titanium.UI.LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_DEFAULT> is used.
